oldDatasetId.title: Old Dataset ID
oldDatasetId.description: ID of the old dataset to compare.

newDatasetId.title: New Dataset ID
newDatasetId.description: ID of the new dataset to compare.

fieldToMapBy.title: Field to Map Items By
fieldToMapBy.description: Field used to find which items should be matched for comparison. Usually some identifier like `url` or `id`.

fieldsToDiff.title: Fields to Diff
fieldsToDiff.description: Fields that will be compared between matched items. Usually fields like `text`, `description`, `markdown`.

outputTypes.title: What to output
outputTypes.description: Which items should be pushed to the default dataset

outputDatasetId.title: Output Dataset ID or name (optional)
outputDatasetId.description: Enables storing the diff items into a separate dataset. Useful for tracking historical changes or integration workflows.
